# nk-loadingbar



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property     | Attribute    | Description                          | Type     | Default |
| ------------ | ------------ | ------------------------------------ | -------- | ------- |
| `percentage` | `percentage` | How far the loading is               | `number` | `0`     |
| `text`       | `text`       | Text displayed below the loading bar | `string` | `''`    |

- [nk-stack](../stack)
- [nk-paragraph](../paragraph)
